5 minutes to your next meeting and your empty stomach is growling? No stress! Just grab a delicious snack at any of our 5 Selfly Store food to-go points at the venue – this will only take you as short as under 30 seconds!

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Selfly Store revolutionizes food service at large-scale events like Slush with its intelligent retail solutions. With our RFID-equipped fridges and freezers, attendees can swiftly purchase food, reducing wait times to under 30 seconds. In 2022, at Slush Helsinki, we strategically placed 15 of our Model 3 cabinets at venue. This innovative partnership reduced long queues, offering attendees a seamless “Selfly” dining experience.

For Slush 2023, we’re upping the game by deploying 20 cabinets, ensuring participants spend more time immersed in the event and less time waiting for refreshments.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]OPENING TIMES
Day 1 at 11am-6pm
Day 2 at 11am-9pm

No frozen ingredients. No shortcuts. No compromises. Handmade from the best ingredients.

Fresh tastes best, which is why they bake their own buns in the restaurant, every day. It’s also why they make our fries from fresh potatoes, and prepare their own sauces from scratch.

Friends & Brgrs was established in 2014 in the small town of Pietarsaari, by six burger loving friends and is now one the most popular burger restaurant chains in Finland.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ background_image=”7536″ background_image_tablet=”7536″ background_image_phone=”7536″ background_image_position=”center center” background_image_stacking=”default” enable_bg_scale=”true” background_image_loading=”default” column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”50px” column_link_target=”_self” overflow=”visible” el_class=”column-image” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”1px” column_border_color=”#333333″ column_border_style=”solid” column_padding_type=”default” gradient_type=”default”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-2″ heading_tag=”h4″ heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”MENU”][vc_column_text]

Halloumi Brgr 10€ (meal 16,90€)

Halloumi, lettuce, tomato, onion, Friend’s mayo

Vegan Brgr 9€ (meal 15,90€) (VEG)

column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]OPENING TIMES
Day 1 at 11am-6pm
Day 2 at 11am-9pm

We have been offering Asian taste experiences all over Finland since 2009, when our first restaurant was opened in Hanko. Our restaurant, formerly known as Hanko Sushi, has been the country’s most popular sushi restaurant chain for years.

However, the Asian cuisine includes much more than sushi. At the end of 2022, we expanded our selection: we now serve only the best of Asia – a versatile and tasty spread of Asia’s best flavors.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ background_image=”7592″ background_image_tablet=”7592″ background_image_phone=”7592″ background_image_position=”center center” background_image_stacking=”default” enable_bg_scale=”true” background_image_loading=”default” column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”50px” column_link_target=”_self” overflow=”visible” el_class=”column-image” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”1px” column_border_color=”#333333″ column_border_style=”solid” column_padding_type=”default” gradient_type=”default”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-2″ heading_tag=”h4″ heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”MENU”][vc_column_text]Tofu Poke Bowl — €14.90 (G,VEG)
Jalotofu, rice, avocado, edamame, cucumber, red onion, ginger, poke sauce, teriyaki sauce

Green Curry — €16.90 (G,VEG)
Marinated Jalotofu, green curry coconut cream sauce, zucchini, leek and sugar pea, served with rice

Sushi vegetable assortment — €14.90 (G,VEG)
Tofu pocket, grilled zucchini, avocado, kappa, vegetable uramaki

G = Gluten free VEG = vegan

line_reveal_by_space_text_effect=”default” content_alignment=”left” mobile_content_alignment=”inherit” link_target=”_self” text_content=”Have a proper moment to sit down? Looking for a more comprehensive eating experience?Tundra is the right place for you.

The atmosphere of this restaurant right across the main cloakroom draws inspiration from this year’s “building to last” event theme. Tundras are places where only the most resilient plants survive the cold and windy weather. If this sounds a bit rough, worry not – on top of this Tundra at Slush you can find an oasis in the form of a table that is filled with fresh and hearty food.” font_line_height=”1″ Full of fresh salads from seasonal ingredients, two warm main courses (VEG) and a small sweet dessert — 24.00€

Green salad with cranberry vinaigrette V,G 

Finnish organic tofu with apple and cabbage salad V,G 

Forest mushroom pie and red onion jam L,G 

Roasted pumpkin, buckwheat and blue cheese L,G i 

Sunchoke salad, spruce syrup and seeds V,G 

Bread and herb spread V,L 

___

Baked broad beans and mushroom sauce V,G 

Vegetable and dream fraiche sauce seasoned with rosemary V,G 

Roasted potato, kale and vegetables V,G 

___

Cranberry pudding with caramel sauce V,G [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-2″ heading_tag=”h4″ heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Lanson Champagne Bar”][vc_column_text]Also, we know reaching the top is something to celebrate. That’s why you can find a Lanson Champagne Bar on the balcony of Tundra, with an unique selection from organic to vintage champagnes. Grab your team, grab some bubbles and raise a toast for your accomplishments!

column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]OPENING TIMES
Day 1 at 10am-6pm
Day 2 at 10am-1:30am

Rooftop, not only provides the best view at Slush. This restaurant serves dishes for the foodies, and great wines to pair with those, curated by our catering partner NoHo. Top it it all off with some nice latte or cappucino.

During the Afterparty on Day 2, you can taste the local craft-beers at Helsinki Bryggeri tasting bar that will pop up in Rooftop at 6pm-9pm. Helsinki Bryggeri is a craft brewery and restaurant from the heart of Helsinki, located on Sofiankatu, between Senaatintori and Kauppatori. Behind our Helsinki Bryggeri Beers is open-minded and quick-witted brewmaster Roope Lehtoranta. If you’re lucky, you might even meet the bearded brewmaster at Slush. Cheers![/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-2″ heading_tag=”h4″ heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”MENU”][vc_column_text]MENU

Jerusalem artichoke soup with herb croutons and smoked olive oil — 13.50€ (L)

Rooftop Vegan burger — 18.50€ (VEG)

Melanzane di parmigiana with herb salad and nettle pesto — 17.50€ (G)

Vegan Caesar salad — 14.90€ (VEG)

AFTERPARTY MENU

Hipster Dog — 7,50€ (VEG)
roasted tofu, chili, coriander, pickled red onion

Hot Vegan — 7,50€ (VEG)

vegan chorizo, broad bean chili, vegan cheese

Rooftop Vegan burger — 18.50€ (VEG)

 

VEG = Vegan, G = Gluten free, L = Lactose free

column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]OPENING TIMES
Day 1 at 8:30am-6pm
Day 2 at 8:30am-1:30am

Ruby Cafe is located between Founder Stage and Builder Stage – so right in the center of action! Oh, and this Cafe is also an art piece to behold – don’t miss it!

There’s both salty and sweet delicacies to go with your coffee on the menu. In addition, a few selected dishes from other restaurants are available.

During the Afterparty, Ruby Cafe turns into Wine & Spritz Bar. You’ll find variations of quality wines or something fresh from the Gin Spritz cocktail menu. And if you go hungry while at it, you can grab the ultimate festival food, hot dogs, from the next counter.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-2″ heading_tag=”h4″ heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”MENU”][vc_column_text]MENU

Food
Hanko Asia Vegetable sushi assortment — 14.90€ (VEG,G)
Farouge vegan meze plate — 16.90€ (VEG,G)

Salty
Tomato-rocket Focaccia with vegan “feta” — 8.50€ (VEG)

Sweet
Pistachio bun 4.50€ (VEG)
Cardamom bun 3.50€ (L)

AFTERPARTY MENU

Hipster Dog — 7,50€ (VEG)
Roasted tofu, chili, coriander, pickled red onion

Hot Vegan — 7,50 (VEG)
Vegan chorizo, broad bean chili, vegan cheese

VEG = Vegan, G = Gluten free, L = Lactose free
